==== lvl1 ============: Below are all words for priority level 1 (this string does not need to be translated)
logging_enabled: 启用日志记录 [[ Logging is enabled
clear_utterance: 清除当前说话 [[ Clear the current utterance
jump_to_current_home: 跳至当前的主面板 [[ Jump to the current home board
go_back_one_board: 回一板 [[ Go back one board
erase_last_button: 删除发声中的最后一个按钮 [[ Erase the last button from the utterance
speak_full_utterance: 说出全部话语 [[ Speak the full utterance

share_window: 打开共享窗口 [[ Open the Share window
copy_sentence: 将句子框中的内容复制到剪贴板 [[ Copy what's in the sentence box to the clipboard
past_sentence: 将clipbooard的文本内容粘贴到句子框中 [[ Paste the text contents of the clipbooard to the sentence box
alerts_window: 打开警报窗口 [[ Open the Alerts window

speak_louder: 大声说出当前说话 [[ Speak the current utterance, louder

phrases_window: 打开短语窗口 [[ Open the Phrases window

toggle_board_lock: 拨动板锁 [[ Toggle Board Lock
suggestion: 在此按钮中显示一个建议词 [[ Show a suggestion word in this button spacee
pluralize: 使单词复数 [[ Make the word plural
singularize: 使单词单数 [[ Make the word singular
add_comparative: 添加“更多”或“ -er”（比较） [[ Add "more" or "-er" (comparative)
add_superlative: 添加“最大”或“ -est”（最高级） [[ Add "most" or "-est" (superlative)
ordinal: 将“ st”，“ nd”，“ th”等（第一，第二，第三）添加到数字（普通） [[ Add "st", "nd","th", etc. (1st, 2nd, 3rd) to a number (ordinal)
negate_the_word: 否定这个词 [[ Negate the word
past_tense: 使动词过去时 [[ Make the verb past tense
make_present_participle: 使动词现在分词 [[ Make the verb present participle
beep_sound: 内联播放提示音 [[ Play a beep sound inline
current_calendar_date: 说出当前的日历日期 [[ Speak the current calendar date
current_time: 说出当前时间 [[ Speak the current time
current_day: 说出星期几 [[ Speak the current day of the week
yesterday_calendar_date: 说出昨天的日历日期 [[ Speak yesterday's calendar date
yesterday_day: 说出昨天的星期几 [[ Speak the day of the week for yesterday
tomorrow_calendar_date: 说出明天的日历日期 [[ Speak tomorrow's calendar date
tomorrow_day: 说出明天的星期几 [[ Speak the day of the week for tomorrow
current_month: 说出当月的名字 [[ Speak the name of the current month
next_month: 说出下个月的名字 [[ Speak the name of the next month
last_month: 讲上个月的名字 [[ Speak the name of the previous month
battery_level: 说出当前的电池电量 [[ Speak the current battery level
set_volume: 设置设备音量（向上，向下或##） [[ Set the device volume (up, down, or ##)
random_dice_number: 播放骰子滚动声音，然后说出一个从1到n的随机数 [[ Play a dice rolling sound and then speak a random number from 1 to n
pick_random_number: 讲一个从1到n的随机数 [[ Speak a random number from 1 to n
random_spinner_number: 播放微调声音，然后说出一个从1到n的随机数 [[ Play a spinner sound and then speak a random number from 1 to n
launch_native_keyboard: 打开本地键盘（如果可用） [[ Open the native keyboard if available
login_required: 用户名和密码都是必需的 [[ Username and password are both required

confirm_all_external_buttons: 在打开任何外部链接的按钮之前进行确认 [[ Confirm Before Opening Any Externally-Linked Buttons
prevent_external_buttons: 不允许打开外部链接的按钮 [[ Do Not Allow Opening Externally-Linked Buttons

highlight_all: 突出显示选择中的所有按钮 [[ Highlight All Buttons on Selection

comic_sans_small: 小写的漫画Sans [[ Comic Sans, All Lowercase
open_dyslexic_caps: OpenDyslexic，全部大写 [[ OpenDyslexic, All Uppercase
open_dyslexic_small: OpenDyslexic，全部小写 [[ OpenDyslexic, All Lowercase

headset: 如果已连接，则在耳机上播放 [[ Play on Headset if Connected
speaker: 即使连接了耳机也可以在扬声器上播放 [[ Play on Speaker even with Headset Connected
headset_or_earpiece: 在耳机或听筒上播放 [[ Play on Headset or Earpiece
earpiece: 在听筒上播放 [[ Play on Earpiece

really_slow_8: 真的很慢（扫描8秒） [[ Really Slow (8-second sweep)
red_circle: 红色圆圈 [[ A Red Circle
arrow: 箭头光标 [[ An Arrow Cursor
more_sensitive: 更敏感（需要较少运动） [[ More Sensitive (Less Movement Required)
even_more_sensitive: 更加敏感（需要最小移动） [[ Even More Sensitive (Minimal Movement Required)

level_3: 3-其他基本核心 [[ 3 - Additional Basic Core

This Board
messages_and_alerts: 消息和警报 [[ Messages and Alerts
loading_messages: 正在载入讯息... [[ Loading messages...
no_messages_or_alerts_to_show: 没有消息或警报显示 [[ No messages or alerts to show
modify_and_repair_message: 修改和修复消息 [[ Modify and Repair Message
no_words_to_repair: 句子框中没有可修改的文本。修复工具可让您快速添加，删除，移动或修改单词，以在用户当前的语音窗口内进行更改。 [[ There is no text in the sentence box to modify. The repairs tool lets you quickly add, delete, move or modify words to make changes within the user's current speech window.
no_phrases: 尚未保存任何短语。您可以通过在句子框下拉菜单中点击“记住此”来保存短语。 [[ No phrases have been saved. You can save phrases by hitting "Remember This" in the sentence box dropdown.
every_voice_should_be_heard: 每个声音都应该听到 [[ Every voice should be heard
private_data_reminder: 切记：所有董事会和报告均可能包含用户数据，应保密并受到尊重。 [[ Remember: all boards and reports may contain user data, and should be kept private and treated with respect.
success: 成功！一瞬间... [[ Success! One Moment...
share_via_facebook: 通过Facebook分享 [[ Share via Facebook
share_via_twitter: 通过Twitter分享 [[ Share via Twitter
set_as_home_board: 设为本垒 [[ Set as Home Board
in_board_set: 在用户板上 [[ in the user's board set
speak_as_me: 跟我说话 [[ speak as me
add_to_sidebar: 添加到侧边栏 [[ Add to Sidebar
not_signed_in: 尚未登入 [[ Not signed in
exit_speak_mode: 退出朗读模式 [[ Exit Speak Mode
settings_etc: 设置，菜单等 [[ Settings, Menu, etc.
show_all_buttons: 显示隐藏的按钮 [[ Show Hidden Buttons
stay_on_board: 留在董事会 [[ Stay on this Board
did_you_know: 你知道吗？ %app_name%现在可以作为 [[ Did you know? %app_name% is now available as a
communication_is_for_everyone: 沟通适合所有人。 %app_name% [[ Communication is for everyone. %app_name%
empowers_hearing: 使人们能够表达自己的声音。 [[ empowers people to make their voices heard.
app_lets_you: 有些人很难听-自己没有错。孤独症，脑瘫，唐氏综合症，安格曼综合症和瑞特综合症等残障人士使许多人难以独自交流。称为增强和替代通信（AAC）的强大软件可以填补空白，并使每个声音都能听到。 [[ Some people are hard to hear -- through no fault of their own. Disabilities like autism, cerebral palsy, Down syndrome, Angelman syndrome and Rett syndrome make it harder for many individuals to communicate on their own. Powerful software called Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) can fill the gaps and make every voice heard.
app_lets_you_2: 在%app_name%，我们致力于通过强大的开源技术来帮助那些有复杂沟通需求的人们发声，该技术可以轻松适应个人并支持周围的所有人，以帮助他们取得成功。 [[ At %app_name% we work to help bring out the voices of those with complex communication needs through powerful open-source technology that easily adapts to the individual and supports everyone around them trying to help them succeed.
more_download_options: 更多下载选项 [[ more download options
personalize_text: 跨多个设备的通信和访问。随着时间的流逝，您的词汇量将随着简单的界面而增加，并获得大量帮助和培训。 [[ communication and access across multiple devices. Grow your vocabulary over time with a simple interface backed up by lots of help and training.
offline_text: 借助云中的备份功能，因此在出现故障时切换设备非常轻松。您还可以与其他人共享木板，并向他们开放许可以供任何人使用。 [[ with backup in the cloud so it's painless to switch devices if something breaks. You can also share boards with others and open-license them for anyone to use.
empower_the_team: 授权团队 [[ Empower the team
insights_text: 报告可以帮助所有人改善。团队可以为每个人进行协作和修改电路板，而不必拿走设备。 [[ with reports that help everyone improve. Teams can collaborate and modify boards for each individual without having to take their device away.
pricing_per_communicator: %app_name%按通讯员计价，因此父母，治疗师和老师都可以免费注册，并在自己的设备上使用强大的报告和通讯功能，而无需花很多钱。 [[ %app_name% is priced per-communicator, so parents, therapists, and teachers can all sign up for free and use the powerful reporting and communication features on their own devices without breaking the bank.
whats_it_cost: 查看我们的价格详情。 [[ see our pricing details.
see_how: 看看人们如何使用 [[ see how people are using
try_app: 自己尝试 _ TR2A _ [[ Try %app_name_upper% for yourself
sign_up_for_free: 准备看更多吗？立即注册以开始使用！ [[ Ready to see more? Sign up now to get started!
allow_cookies: 将使用情况数据发送到%app_name%进行分析，错误跟踪和功能改进 [[ Send usage data to %app_name% for analytics, error tracking and feature improvements
see_exmaples: ...或查看一些公共共享的董事会 [[ ...or check out some publicly-shared boards
people_i_supervise: 我监督的人 [[ People I Supervise
no_goal_set: 没有设定目标 [[ no goal set
set_a_goal: 设定一个目标 [[ set a goal
ready_to_try_app: 准备好自己尝试%app_name%吗？每次注册均可免费使用2个月，以查看应用程序是否适用于轮胎，无需信用卡！ [[ Ready to try %app_name% out for yourself? Every signup gets 2 months free to kick the tires and see if the app is going to work for them, no credit card required!
==== lvl2 ============: Below are all words for priority level 2 (this string does not need to be translated)
email_shares: 当我管理的人与我分享消息时给我发送电子邮件 [[ Email Me When People I Supervise Share a Message with Me
text_shares: 当我监管的人向我发送消息时给我发短信 [[ Text Me When People I Supervise Share a Message with Me
app_shares: 我监督的人与我分享消息时在应用中显示 [[ Show In the App When People I Supervise Share a Message with Me
no_notifications: 不要通过电子邮件发送给我Communicator报告 [[ Don't Email Me Communicator Reports
weekly_notifications: 通过电子邮件发送给我Communicator每周报告 [[ Email Me Weekly Communicator Reports
bi_weekly_reports: 每两周通过电子邮件发送给我Communicator报告 [[ Email Me Communicator Reports Every Two Weeks
monthly_reports: 通过电子邮件发送给我Communicator每月报告 [[ Email Me Monthly Communicator Reports
email_goal_completion: 完成目标或获得徽章后给我发送电子邮件 [[ Email Me When Goals are Completed or Badges are Earned
dont_email_goal_completion: 完成目标或获得徽章后不要通过电子邮件发送给我 [[ Don't Email Me When Goals are Completed or Badges are Earned
pointer_release: 我在哪里释放指针 [[ Where I Release My Pointer
pointer_start: 我第一次按的地方 [[ Where I First Press
tap_and_swipe_inflections: 点击以选择，滑动以进行变形 [[ Tap to Select, Swipe for Inflections
eye_gaze: 视线追踪 [[ Eye Gaze Tracking
mouse_dwell: 基于光标的驻留跟踪 [[ Cursor-Based Dwell Tracking
joystick_key_dwell: 游戏杆/按键停留追踪 [[ Joystick/Key-Based Dwell Tracking
time_on_target: 通过查看/停留在目标上进行选择 [[ Select by Looking/Dwelling on a Target
button_select: 通过按下开关或按钮进行选择 [[ Select by Hitting a Switch or Button
system_default_voice: 系统默认语音 [[ System Default Voice
prior_home: 先前的主板 [[ Prior Home Boards
javscript_info: 没有相对现代的JavaScript引擎，甚至无法加载该页面。 [[ This page wouldn't even load without a relatively-modern JavaScript engine.
local_storage_info: 使用localStorage代替cookie来记住用户是否已经登录，他们在哪个板上等。 [[ localStorage is used instead of cookies to remember whether a user is already logged in, what board they were on, etc.
speech_synthesis_info: 大多数现代的Web浏览器都实现了语音合成引擎，该引擎可用于将文本转换为语音。 [[ Most modern web browsers implement a Speech Synthesis engine that can be used to turn text into speech.
speech_synthesis_voices: 语音合成语音 [[ Speech Synthesis Voices
speech_synthesis_info2: 如果您的设备支持语音合成，则默认情况下应安装一个或多个语音。有时，声音可能会“丢失”并停止出现在设备上。 [[ If your device supports Speech Synthesis, it should have one or more voices installed by default. Sometimes voices can get "lost" and stop appearing on the device.
file_uploads_info: 并非所有浏览器都支持%app_name%使用的现代文件上传功能。如果您的设备不支持，那么大多数现代桌面浏览器都应该可以上传。 [[ Not all browsers support the modern file uploading features that %app_name% uses. If your device doesn't, most modern desktop browsers should upload just fine.
file_storage_info: 设备和某些浏览器允许您存储文件以供离线使用。如果此功能不可用，则可以将某些文件存储在数据库中，但是您可能会遇到存储错误。 [[ Devices and some browsers allow you to store files for offline use. If this feature is not available, some files can be stored in the database but you may run into storage errors.
indexed_db_info: IndexedDB是用于下载电路板和电路板内容的存储工具，因此即使没有Internet连接，%app_name%仍然可以工作。如果设备的内存已满，有时这些数据库将被自动（并且意外地）删除。 [[ IndexedDB is a storage tool used to download boards and board contents so that %app_name% can still work even without an Internet connection. If the device's memory gets full sometimes these databases will be automatically (and unexpectedly) deleted.
sqlite_info: SQLite是另一个用于下载电路板和电路板内容的存储工具，因此即使没有Internet连接，%app_name%仍然可以工作。 SQLite数据库在许多设备上不可用，但未经许可不会被删除。 [[ SQLite is another storage tool used to download boards and board contents so that %app_name% can still work even without an Internet connection. SQLite databases aren't available on as many devices, but won't get deleted without permission.
media_recording_info: 媒体录制允许您使用设备的网络摄像头拍照和录制音频。某些移动设备使用自己的内置媒体录制工具，而不是%app_name%的录制器。 [[ Media Recording allows you to take pictures and record audio using your device's webcam. Some mobile devices use their own built-in media recording tools instead of %app_name%'s recorders.
xhr_cors_info: 为了脱机工作，%app_name%需要从多个网站下载图像。 XHR / CORS不需要此功能，但是它使下载过程更有效。 [[ In order to work offline, %app_name% needs to download images from multiple web sites. XHR/CORS is not required for this to work, but it makes the download process more efficient.
canvas_info: %app_name%使您可以对图像进行裁剪和着色以更好地满足您的电路板要求，并且使用称为Canvas的元素来实现此目的。 [[ %app_name% lets you crop and colorize images to better match your board requirements, and it uses something called the Canvas element to make that happen.
audio_playback_info: 如果您录制自己的声音，则希望能够播放它们，但并非所有浏览器都支持音频播放，或者并非总是支持%app_name%使用的文件类型。 [[ If you record your own sounds you'll want to be able to play them back, but not all browsers support audio playback, or don't always support the file types %app_name% uses.
drag_and_drop_info: 在移动设备上没有意义，但是在桌面浏览器上，在编辑时将图像和声音拖放到按钮上可以节省大量时间。 [[ It doesn't make sense on a mobile device, but on a desktop browser dragging and dropping images and sounds onto buttons while editing can save a lot of time.
file_reader_info: 如果您要从计算机上传图像或音频以在%app_name%中使用，则FileReader工具是必需的组件。 [[ The FileReader tool is a required component if you're uploading images or audio from your computer to use in %app_name%.
geolocation_info: %app_name%可以选择使用地理位置来跟踪使用情况并生成可以比较多个位置之间的通信的报告。 [[ %app_name% optionally uses geolocation to track usage and build reports that can compare communication across multiple locations.
speech_to_text: 语音转文字 [[ Speech to Text
speech_to_text_info: 某些浏览器允许您讲话，并将单词转换为文本。这样可以更轻松地进行操作，例如创建要添加到新创建的板上的按钮列表。 [[ Some browsers allow you speak and have your words converted to text. This can make it easier to do things like make a list of buttons to add to a newly-created board.
online: 在线/离线状态 [[ Online/Offline Status
online_info: 一些浏览器允许检查在线/离线状态。 %app_name%可以使用它来更有效地脱机运行，并在重新建立Internet连接时自动同步更改和日志。 [[ Some browsers allow checking for online/offline status. %app_name% can use this to function more effectively offline, and to automatically sync changes and logs when an Internet connection is re-established.
wakelock_info: 某些移动设备允许%app_name%防止由于不活动而关闭屏幕。 ％app_name％仅在处于“讲话”模式或正在主动同步板时使屏幕保持打开状态。 [[ Some mobile devices allow %app_name% to prevent the screen from turning off due to inactivity. %app_name% only keeps the screen on when in Speak Mode or when actively syncing boards.
fullscreen: 全屏模式 [[ Full Screen Mode
fullscreen_info: 在某些设备上，%app_name%可以在“朗读模式”下激活全屏模式，以隐藏所有导航和状态按钮。 [[ On some devices %app_name% can activate full screen mode when in Speak Mode to hide any navigation and status buttons from view.

confirm_logging_code: 在更改日志访问设置之前，必须使用当前的日志代码确认权限。如果您丢失或忘记了此代码，请联系技术支持。 [[ Before you can change log access settings, you must confirm permission using the current logging code. If you have lost or forgotten this code, please contact technical support.

logging_uses_google: 注意：启用日志记录后，在生成报告图表时，匿名使用情况数据将发送到Google服务。禁用日志记录后，目标跟踪和徽章奖励将不会更新，因为不会记录任何数据。 [[ NOTE: When logging is enabled, anonymous usage data will be sent to Google services when generating report charts. When logging is disabled, goal tracking and badge awards will not update since no data will be logged.

eval_intro: 欢迎使用评估工具！该工具有助于评估沟通者访问和理解按钮，符号和概念的能力。 [[ Welcome to the Eval Tool! This tool helps evaluate a communicator's ability to access and understand buttons, symbols and concepts.
eval_intro_2: 您可以随时使用右上方的菜单结束或配置评估。评估完成后，您也可以添加注释。 [[ You can use the top right menu to end or configure the evaluation any time. You can also add notes once the evaluation has completed.
find_target_intro: 本节显示了位于不同位置和大小的单个目标，以帮助评估识别和访问目标的能力。 [[ This section shows a single target at different locations and sizes to help assess ability to identify and access targets.
diff_target_intro: 本节显示了不同大小和布局的多个目标，以确定区分能力。 [[ This section shows multiple targets at different sizes and layouts to determine ability to differentiate.
symbols_intro: 本节显示不同样式的图片，以查看用户是否比其他样式更成功 [[ This section shows different styles of pictures to see if the user has more success with one style over another
find_show_intro: 本部分显示照片或概念，并提示用户在下面找到相应的符号 [[ This section shows a photograph or concept and prompts the user to find the corresponding symbol below
open_ended_intro: 本节显示简单的场景。鼓励用户使用提供的按钮/键进行观察或讨论场景 [[ This section shows simple scenes. Encourage the user to make observations or discuss the scene using the buttons/keys provided
categories_intro: 本部分显示照片，并提示用户根据类别对照片进行分类 [[ This section shows photographs and prompts the user to classify them based on their category
inclusion_exclusion_association_intro: 本节显示照片并提示用户识别相关或不相关的项目 [[ This section shows photographs and prompts the user to identify related or unrelated items
literacy_intro: 本节显示图像和可能单词的列表（无图像），以检查阅读技巧 [[ This section shows an image and a list of possible words (without images) to check for reading skills
done_eval: 完毕！点击最后一个按钮以保存评估并查看结果！ [[ Done! Hit the final button to save the evaluation and see the results!

custom_goal: 我会定义自己的目标 [[ I Will Define My Own Goal
buttons_explainer: 一致的用法很重要！交流不仅仅是在一个地方发生的，要使交流者精通其设备，他们需要全天候在不同的位置和情况下使用交流设备。 [[ Consistent usage is important! Communication isn't something that just happens in one location, and for communicators to get proficient using their device they need to have it out and available throughout the day, in different locations and situations.
words_explainer: 现在，您的目标是专注于以下方面： [[ Right now you have a goal to focus on the following:
modeling_explainer: 建模是向通信者展示他们如何说出使用其通信设备的事物的过程。就像口头交流一样，在交流者独自适应之前，通常需要进行大量建模交流，因此要寻找许多在不同环境和一天中的时间进行建模的机会。 [[ Modeling is the process of showing a communicator how they could say things user their communication device. Just like with spoken communication, it often takes a lot of modeled communication before a communicator gets comfortable on their own, so look for many opportunities to model in different environments and times of day.

board_intro_explainer: 您可以制作一个简短的课程，让人们在选择此电路板时会进行逐步讲解，包括说明和练习短语，供他们使用该电路板查找。 [[ You can build a short lesson that people will walk through when they choose this board set, including explanations and practice phrases for them to find using the board set.

finding_a_home_board: 寻找合适的主板 [[ Finding the Right Home Board
finding_home_board1: 使用通讯工具时，本垒打板是您快速说出一些话的起点，但也跳入了更深层次的话题。拥有一个良好的起点很重要，但是沟通板的样式很多，而且不一定总是最好的。每个人都不一样。以下是一些不同样式的家用主板，并详细说明了它们为何有用。 [[ When using a communication tool, the home board is your starting point to say some things quickly but also jump off into deeper topics. It's important to have a good starting place, but there's lots of different styles of communication boards out there, and it's not always clear which is the best. Every person is different. Here are some different styles of home boards with some detail about why they might be useful.
finding_home_board2: 当找到合适的家用板时，请点击菜单并选择“设为家用”以使其成为您的家用板。 [[ When you find a home board that makes sense, hit the menu and choose "Set as Home" to make it your home board.

supverisor_intro: 主管链接到用户的帐户，并且可以完全访问该用户的帐户。他们可以更改自己的董事会，查看和编辑其私人董事会，查看报告等。将治疗师，父母等添加为主管可能很有价值，但请记住，主管具有完全帐户访问权限，因此请注意谁您添加为主管。 [[ Supervisors are linked to a user's account and can have full access to the user's account. They can change their home board, see and edit their private boards, see reports, etc. It can be valuable for therapists, parents, etc. to be added as supervisors, but remember that supervisors have full account access, so be aware of who you add as supervisors.

gift_explainer: %app_name%是开发交流者的强大工具。如果您知道可以从访问％app_name％中受益的人，则可以代表他们购买会员资格。完成此操作后，您将收到一封包含礼物代码的电子邮件，可用于为％app_name％用户兑换礼物。 [[ %app_name% can be a powerful tool for developing communicators. If you know someone who could benefit from access to %app_name%, you can purchase a membership on their behalf. When you do you will receive an email with a gift code that can be used to redeem your gift for a %app_name% user.
purchase_complete: 购买完成！谢谢！ [[ Purchase complete! Thank you!
gift_code_in_email: 您应该会收到一封电子邮件，其中包含与此购买相关的礼物代码。您可以将电子邮件转发给预定的收件人，或者想出一种更有创意的方法来将代码发送给他们（我听到小号让事情变得很激动）。如果几分钟后仍看不到电子邮件，请务必选中垃圾邮件框。 [[ You should receive an email with the gift code associated with this purchase. You can forward the email to the intended recipient, or come up with a more creative way to get the code to them (I hear trumpets make things exciting). Make sure to check your spam box if you're not seeing the email come through within a few minutes.

If you can afford to pay more, your contribution will help gift %app_name% to additional families in need!

inflections_review_tool: 变形检查工具 [[ Inflections Review Tool
inflections_tool_explainer: %app_name%是一个开源工具，支持多种语言和交互。当我们建立语言单词列表时，可以使用该词库检查工具从多个来源收集信息。在字形上掌握准确的信息有助于我们更好地支持社区。 请记住，此工具收集的所有信息将免费在线发布，并带有开放许可，供他人使用和受益。 [[ %app_name% is an open source tool that supports multiple languages and interactions. This Inflections Review Tool allows us to collect information from multiple sources as we build out language word lists. Having accurate information on word forms helps us better support our communities. Remember, all information collected by this tool will be released for free online with an open license for others to use and benefit from.
inflections_tips: 提示：有些单词有多种类型。有些替代类型太晦涩，以至于它们根本不值得包含在内，请考虑一下普通讲话者会说些什么。如果单词变形，请确保在第一个框中输入其词根（“ look”）。某些动词/副词的某些变形没有意义，请在方框中输入“ N / A”。对于对立面，只要有最明显的地方就行。如果您不确定某个单词，请不要害怕跳过它！ [[ TIPS: Some words have multiple types. Some alternate types are so obscure that they're not really worth including, think about what an average speaker might say. If the word is alreeady inflected ("looking") make sure to enter its root ("look") in the first box. Some inflections for certain verbs/adverbs don't make sense, please put "N/A" in the box. For opposites, just do the most obvious if any. If you're unsure about a word, don't be afraid to skip it!

trends_explainer: %app_name%用户可以选择记录其使用情况数据，以供个人和团队分析和参考。每当有人选择加入数据记录时，我们还会询问他们是否愿意与独立研究人员共享其使用情况数据的匿名记录。我们与非营利研究机构合作，共同分析这些数据，以更好地了解AAC的使用，并研究如何改进支持。 [[ %app_name% users can opt-in to recording their usage data for personal and team analysis and reference. Whenever someone opts-in to data logging, we also ask if they would be willing to share an anonymized record of their usage data with independent researchers. We collaborate with non-profit research organizations to analyze this data in aggregate to provide better insights into AAC use and to investigate how supports can be improved.
trends_explainer2: 如果您有兴趣进行AAC研究，请考虑与我们联系以了解有关此重要项目的更多信息。以下是一些可以匿名收集和汇总收集以帮助AAC研究的数据类型的示例。所有单词使用信息仅基于已选择匿名研究和报告的用户的汇总数据。 [[ If you are interested in conducting AAC research, please consider reaching out to us to learn more about this important project. Below are some examples of the types of data that can be collected, anonymously and in aggregate, to help aid AAC research. All word usage information is based on aggregate data only from users who have opted in to anonymized research and reporting.

speak_mode_intro_1: 语音模式是%app_name%最重要的部分！处于朗读模式时，您可以按任意按钮将其添加到顶部的框中。根据您的设置，当您按下按钮时，它还会说出按钮。您可以点击顶部的方框说出整个句子，也可以使用其他按钮返回首页，退格或清除方框。 [[ Speak Mode is the most important part of %app_name%! When you are in Speak Mode, you can hit any button to add it to the box at the top. Depending on your settings, it will also speak the buttons as you hit them. You can hit the box at the top to speak the whole sentence, or use the other buttons to return home, backspace or clear the box.
speak_mode_intro_2: 当您想退出语音模式时，只需点击右上角的菜单，然后选择“退出语音模式”即可。然后，您可以选择一个家用主板，更改主板，更改用户首选项，查看使用情况报告等。 [[ When you want to exit Speak Mode just hit the menu in the top right corner and select "Exit Speak Mode". Then you can pick a home board, make changes to boards, change user preferences, check out usage reports, etc.
integration_details: 连接的工具详细信息 [[ Connected Tool Details
connected_tool_details: 要使此连接的工具访问和接收来自%app_name%的信息，需要以下令牌。您应该将这些令牌复制下来，因为将来它们将不再可见。 [[ The following tokens are necessary for this connected tool to access and receive information from %app_name%. You should copy these tokens down, as they will not be visible again in the future.

purchased_licenses_lower: 购买的许可证 [[ purchased licenses
compare_notes: 那里有很多通信应用程序和设备，有时很难知道什么对您的通信者会很好。有些应用只能在iPad上运行，而有些则不能与硬件一起使用或自定义功能有限。我们想确保您知道%app_name%可以提供的所有内容，因此我们在下面汇总了比较表。 [[ There are lots of communication apps and devices out there, and sometimes it's hard to know what will work well for your communicator. Some apps only run on an iPad and some won't work with hardware or have limited customization. We want to make sure you know everything %app_name% can offer, so we've put together the comparison chart below.

keyboard_with_word_prediction: 带有单词预测功能的键盘 [[ Keyboard With Word Prediction

automated_goal_tracking: 自动目标跟踪 [[ Automated Goal Tracking
two_way_messsaging: 双向消息传递（SMS /电子邮件） [[ Two-Way Messaging (SMS/Email)
built_in_modeling_ideas: 内置建模思路 [[ Built-In Modeling Ideas
remote_editing_and_reports: 远程编辑和报告 [[ Remote Editing & Reports

via_usb_Drive: 通过USB驱动器 [[ via USB drive
share_boards: 与其他用户共享董事会 [[ Share Boards With Other Users
any_windows_computer: 任何Windows计算机 [[ Any Windows Computer
supported_peripherals: 支持的替代访问 [[ Supported Alternative Access
proud_of_features: 如您所见，我们为%app_name%可以做的一切感到自豪。我们希望构建一些随沟通者的需求而发展的东西，随着他们的需求不断发展和变化，因此内置了许多自定义项来帮助满足每个人的需求。 [[ As you can see, we're pretty proud of everything %app_name% can do. We wanted to build something that could stay with communicators as their needs develop and change over time, so there are a lot of customizations built-in to help support the needs of each individual.
please_share_app: 您看到的激动吗？请与他人分享%app_name%，以帮助传播好词！ [[ Excited by what you see? Please share %app_name% with others to help spread the good word!
read_to_try_it_out: 准备好自己尝试了吗？ [[ Ready to try it out yourself?
sign_up_for_account: 注册%app_name%帐户 [[ Sign up for a %app_name% account
to_see_app_for_yourself: 看看%app_name%到底有多强大和灵活！ [[ to see how powerful and flexible %app_name% really is!
bad_board_import: 导入电路板时出错。请确保您上传了有效的文件，然后重试。 [[ There was an error importing your boards. Please make sure you uploaded a valid file and try again.
import_board_finished_redirecting: 导入完成！您应该被引导到新的董事会... [[ Import finished! You should be directed to the new board...
importing_boards_please_wait: 导入木板，这可能需要几分钟的时间... [[ Importing boards, this could take a few minutes...
notifications_settings: 作为主管，您可以访问与您合作的沟通者的董事会和使用情况报告。如果您愿意，您还可以打开通知，并定期了解交流者的进度，甚至可以选择接收来自已将您添加为主管的交流者的短信。 [[ As a supervisor, you'll have access to boards and usage reports for the communicators you work with. If you'd like, you can also turn on notifications, and receive regular updates on communicator progress, or even opt-in to receiving text messages from communicators that have added you as a supervisor.
communicator_notifications: 启用日志记录后，您可以选择接收定期的电子邮件，其中包含有关一段时间内交流的详细信息，包括当前的目标和单词用法。这可以帮助所有人保持同一页面，并且可以成为帮助沟通者不断进步的有价值的工具。 [[ When logging is enabled, you can opt to receive regular emails with details on communication over time, including current goals and word usage. This can help keep everyone on the same page and can be a valuable tool is helping communicators make continual progress.
summary_emails: 您多久发送一次摘要电子邮件？ [[ How often do you want summary emails?
comm_preference: 您希望沟通者如何向您发送消息？ [[ How would you like communicators to message you?
via_text: 作为短信 [[ As Text Messages
via_email: 作为电子邮件 [[ As Email Messages
via_dashboard: 作为仪表板通知 [[ As Dashboard Notifications
available_under_profile: 您可以随时在“我的帐户”的“个人资料”部分下更改这些和其他通知首选项。 [[ You can change these and other notification preferences under the "Profile" section of "My Account" at any time.
youre_all_set_again: 一切都准备好了！ [[ You're All Set (Again)!
done_setup_2: 现在，您应该知道开始使用%app_name%所需的一切！如果您感到困惑，可以随时点击信息中心上的“支持”链接来访问您的YouTube频道或操作指南。祝你好运！ [[ Now you should know everything you need to get started using %app_name%! If you ever get stumped, you can always hit the "Support" link on the dashboard to access your YouTube channel or How-To Guides. Good luck!
return_to_dashboard: 返回仪表盘 [[ Return to the Dashboard
watch_video: 观看培训视频 [[ Watch the Training Video
usage_1: %app_name%是用于生成语音的工具。您可以点击按钮说出单词或句子，或拼写单词。 [[ %app_name% is a tool for generating speech. You can hit buttons to speak words or sentences, or to spell words.
usage_2: %app_name%不仅仅适用于非语言交流者。一些沟通者仍在学习中，或者仅在某些时候需要帮助，拥有％app_name％之类的AAC“拐杖”可以成为很好的支持工具。 [[ %app_name% isn't just for nonverbal communicators. Some communicators are still learning, or need help only some of the time, and having an AAC "crutch" like %app_name% can be a great support tool.
usage_3: %app_name%可以在任何系统上运行。您可以免费在主要应用商店中找到它，也可以安装Windows应用或在网络浏览器中使用它。使用任何您喜欢的设备。 [[ %app_name% can run on any system. You can find it in the major app stores as a free download, or install the Windows app or use it in your web browser. Use whatever device you like.
usage_4: 有些人担心使用AAC的沟通者永远不会自己说话。但是，最近的研究表明，许多AAC用户一旦感到舒适或熟练后便会继续进行声音交流。 [[ Some people worry that communicators who use AAC will never speak on their own. However, recent research has shown that many AAC users move on to vocal communication once they are more comfortable or proficient.
picking_a_home_board: 选择一个主板 [[ Picking a Home Board
home_boards_1: 每个人都是独一无二的，因此每个沟通者的词汇集通常也对他们来说是独一无二的。使用%app_name%，您可以选择入门套件（或构建自己的入门套件），并一遍又一遍地对其进行个性化设置。 [[ Everyone is unique, so often each communicator's vocabulary set will be unique to them too. With %app_name% you can pick a starter set (or build your own), and personalize it over and over again.
home_boards_2: 重要的是要牢记最终目标。如果沟通者似乎能够成长为一个庞大的词汇表，而不是从少量的按钮开始并随时间增加更多，则从大量的按钮开始并隐藏一些按钮开始。 [[ The important thing is to plan with the end in mind. If a communicator seems like they'll be able to grow into a large vocabulary, instead of starting with a small number of buttons and adding more over time, it may be easier to start with a large number of buttons and just hide some of the buttons to start out.
supervisors_1: 在%app_name%中，沟通者周围的支持团队称为“主管”。主管是为通讯员建模并与其一起工作的用户。他们具有自己的登录名，并且可能是老师或理疗师，父母，照料者等。 [[ In %app_name%, the support team around the communicator are called "supervisors". Supervisors are users that are modeling for and working with a communicator. They have their own login, and might be a teacher or a therapist, a parent, a caregiver, etc.
supervisors_2: 主管将添加到他们的沟通者帐户中，并且可以在自己的设备上看到沟通者的面板，因此他们可以适应用户的词汇表以更好地建模，并且可以在拥有编辑权限的情况下添加新的按钮和短语。 [[ Supervisors are added to their communicator's account, and can see a communicator's boards on their own devices, so they can get comfortable with a user's vocabulary for better modeling, and can add new buttons and phrases if they have editing permission.
modeling_on_boards: 在板上建模 [[ Modeling on Boards
boards_1: %app_name%带有许多不同样式的电路板。当您使用不同的传播者时，您可能会遇到不同的董事会风格和布局。每个沟通者都可以从周围的支持者那里建模如何使用％app_name％中受益。 [[ %app_name% comes with many different styles of boards. As you work with different communicators you may come across different board styles and layouts. Every communicator can benefit from having the supporters around them model how to use %app_name%
board_2: 建模是语言学习的好工具。研究表明，具有AAC模型的AAC用户在采用AAC和进行交流方面取得了更大的成功。 [[ Modeling is a great tool to language learning. Research has shown that AAC users who have people modeling for them have better success adopting and communicating using AAC.
board_3: 建模很简单！与通讯员交谈时，您要做的就是在屏幕上按下按钮。向他们展示如何使用可用的按钮来表达自己。不仅要模拟请求，还要模拟各种不同的思想，观念，观察和问题！您建模的次数越多，就可以向传播者提供更多示例，以了解您认为有效使用其设备的方式。 [[ Modeling is easy! All you do is hit buttons on the screen as you talk to the communicator. Show them how they can use the buttons they have available to express themselves. Don't just model requests, model all kinds of different thoughts, ideas, observations, and questions! The more you model, the more examples you'ree giving the communicator for what you consider valid ways of using their device.
boards_explainer: 在%app_name%中，词汇集由“板”的集合组成。您可以根据通讯器的功能级别和需求选择多种不同类型的电路板。当您找到自己喜欢的板时，请单击“制作此我的家庭板”，使其成为交流者的“家庭板”，这是交流者每次首次加载应用程序时都会看到的内容。 [[ In %app_name% vocabulary sets are made up of a collection of "boards". There are a number of different types of boards you can choose from, depending on the functional level and needs of your communicator. When you find one you like, hit "Make This My Home Board" to make it the communicator's "home board", which is what the communicator will see every time they first load the app.
easy_to_change_later: 紧张你会选错板子吗？别担心！您以后可以轻松更改。 [[ Nervous you'll pick the wrong board? Don't fret! You can easily change things later.
youre_all_set: 大功告成！ [[ You're All Set!
done_setup: 感谢您的学习！如果您想再次进行此设置，则会在信息中心的“其他”下找到一个链接。 [[ Thanks for learning! If you ever want to go through this setup again, you'll find a link under "Extras" on your dashboard.
continue_to_training: 如果您想了解更多有关如何使用%app_name%的知识，可以继续阅读本教程，也可以随时尝试一下。 [[ If you'd like to learn a little more about how to use %app_name%, you can continue this our tutorial, or feel free to try things out on your own.
continue_tutorial: 继续教程 [[ Continue the Tutorial
exiting_speak_mode: 退出朗读模式 [[ Exiting Speak Mode
exit_speak_mode_1: 您可以通过点击右上角的用户菜单退出语音模式。如果您担心用户自己意外退出语音模式，则可以在用户首选项中设置PIN。 [[ You can exit out of Speak Mode by hitting the user menu in the top right corner. If you're worried about a user accidentally exiting Speak Mode on their own, you can set up a PIN in the user's preferences.
pin_for_exiting_speak_mode: （可选）设置一个4位数的引脚以防止退出语音模式： [[ Optionally set a 4-digit pin to prevent exiting Speak Mode:
usage_logging_and_reports: 使用情况记录和报告 [[ Usage Logging and Reports
logging_reports_1: %app_name%具有功能强大的内置报告工具，使护理人员，治疗师和支持者可以查看设备的使用时间，最常用的词语以及实现目标的过程。要使用这些有用的功能，只需启用日志记录即可。 [[ %app_name% has powerful built-in reporting tools that allow caregivers, therapists and supporters to see things like what time of day the device is being used, most common words and progress toward goals. To use these helpful features, just enable logging.
logging_is_enabled: 启用日志记录 [[ Logging is Enabled
a_little_about_core: 关于核心的一点 [[ A Little About Core
core_1: AAC的一个重要概念是“核心”一词。核心词是我们在日常交流中经常使用的词，可以有多种含义。核心词可以帮助成长中的沟通者全天学习交流，而不仅仅是在一两种情况下。 [[ One important concept with AAC is "core" words. Core words are words we use often in everyday communication, and can have multiple meanings. Core words can help growing communicators learn to communicate throughout their day, instead of just in one or two situations.
core_2: 想象一下，如果您能说的只是预定义的短语，例如“我饿了”，“我累了”或“让我们再做一次”。您将如何询问某人的日子？你怎么说你不喜欢什么？我们可以尝试教他们使用核心词构建自己的短语，而不是尝试思考传播者可能需要的所有可能的短语。 [[ Imagine if all you could say were predefined phrases like "I'm hungry", "I'm tired", or "Let's do that again." How would you ask someone about their day? How would you say you didn't like something? Instead of trying to think of all possible phrases a communicator might need, we can teach them to build their own phrases using core words.
core_3: 记住要牢记最终目标，并找到包含足够核心单词的词汇集，以使沟通者能够成长。 [[ Remember to plan with the end in mind, and find a vocabulary set with enough core words for the communicator to grow into.
select_voice: 现在让我们选择一个声音。这是当交流者按下按钮时人们会听到的。 [[ Now let's pick a voice. This is what people will hear when the communicator hits buttons.
free_trial: 请紧记：您仍在免费试用中，因此当前您只能访问设备的内置语音。购买%app_name%之后，您可以下载90多种优质音色之一。 [[ Keep in mind: you're still in the free trial, so currently you only have access to the device's built-in voices. After you purchase %app_name%, you can download one of over 90 premium voices.
supporter_limited_voices: 您使用的是%app_name%受限帐户，因此当前您只能访问设备的内置语音。付费的沟通者帐户也可以下载高级语音，以用于“讲话”模式。 [[ You are using a limited %app_name% account, so currently you only have access to the device's built-in voices. Paid communicator accounts can also download premium voices for use in Speak Mode.
supporter_modeling_only: 您正在使用仅建模的%app_name%帐户，因此当前您只能访问设备的内置语音。如果您需要使用优质的语音服务，请考虑购买付费的沟通者帐户。 [[ You are using a modeling-only %app_name% account, so currently you only have access to the device's built-in voices. Consider purchasing a paid communicator account if you need access to premium voices.
paid_voices: 请记住，您还可以浏览可下载到付费帐户的移动和Windows应用程序的高级语音。 [[ Remember, you can also browse the premium voices that can be downloaded to mobile and Windows apps for paid accounts.
listen_to_this_voice: 听这个声音 [[ Listen to This Voice
browse_premium_voices: 浏览高级声音 [[ Browse Premium Voices
voice_as_fallback: 如果您打算录制消息，则此声音将仅用于没有录制内容的任何按钮，或者用于使用键盘手动拼写的单词。 [[ If you're planning to record messages, this voice will only be used for any buttons that don't have recordings attached to them, or for words that are manually spelled using the keyboard.
supervisors_explainer: %app_name%与沟通者周围的支持者团队合作得最好。每个用户都可以拥有自己的％app_name％帐户（支持者是免费的），而交流者可以通过将团队成员添加为“主管”来将团队成员连接到他们的帐户。 [[ %app_name% works best with a team of supporters around the communicator. Every user can have their own %app_name% account (supporters are free), and communicators can connect team members to their account by adding them as "supervisors".
get_added_as_supervisor: 为了查看与您合作的沟通者的董事会和报告，这些用户需要从其仪表板中添加您。您可以鼓励他们将沟通者周围的所有人添加为主管，以帮助建立强大的支持团队。 %app_name%提供免费的仅建模帐户，以帮助所有人参与其中！ [[ In order to see the boards and reports for communicators you work with, those users need to add you from their dashboard. You can encourage them to add everyone around the communicator as supervisors to help build a strong support team. %app_name% offers free modeling-only accounts to help everyone get involved!
add_lots_of_supervisors: 学习AAC与传播者周围的许多支持者一起工作效果最佳。您可以鼓励家庭成员，老师，治疗师等人员注册免费的支持者帐户，然后将其添加为主管，以授予对董事会，报告和目标的访问权限。 [[ Learning AAC works best with lots of supporters around communicator. You can encourage people like family members, teachers, therapists, etc. to sign up for a free supporter account, and then add them as supervisors to grant access to boards, reports and goals.
add_of_manage_supervisors: 添加或管理主管 [[ Add or Manage Supervisors
accessing_linked_boards: 访问链接的板 [[ Accessing Linked Boards
folders_1: 带有小文件夹图标或角落标记的按钮是链接的按钮，这意味着如果选择它们，将带您到另一个板。这样一来，您可以拥有多个级别，并且单词和短语比单个屏幕上显示的更多。您总是可以通过单击“主页”按钮回到第一板。 [[ Buttons that have a little folder icon or a mark in the corner are linked buttons, which means that if you select them it will take you to another board. This lets you have multiple levels, with more words and phrases than could fit on a single screen. You can always get back to the first board by hitting the home button.
folders_2: 默认情况下，链接的按钮不讲话，并且当通讯员按下非链接的按钮时，它们将被带回到主板，但是这两个设置都是可选的，可以在用户的首选项中进行更改。 [[ By default linked buttons do not speak, and when the communicator hits a non-linked button they will be taken back to the home board, but both of these settings are optional and can be changed in a user's preferences.
speak_on_select: 选择每个按钮后说 [[ Speak after each button selection
speak_linked_buttons: 即使选择链接的按钮也可以讲话 [[ Speak even when linked buttons are selected
unlinked_auto_home_return: 选择未链接的按钮后返回家中 [[ Return home when unlinked buttons are selected
access_selection: 该沟通者将如何选择按钮？ [[ How will this communicator be selecting buttons?
touching_or_clicking: 触摸或点击 [[ Touching or Clicking
switch_access: 使用开关扫描 [[ Scanning Using a Switch
dwell_tracking: 眼动或驻留追踪 [[ Eye or Dwell Tracking
access_selection_action: 当通讯员选择一个按钮时会发生什么？ [[ What happens when the communicator selects a button?
home_return_1: 当选择按钮%app_name%会自动返回到主电路板。这有助于为每个按钮制定一致的顺序（称为运动计划），因此我们建议将其作为默认按钮，但可以根据需要进行更改。 [[ When a button is selected %app_name% will automatically return to the home board. This helps develop a consistent sequence for each button (called a motor plan), so we recommend it as the default but you can change it if needed.
return_to_the_home_board: 返回首页 [[ Return to the Home Board
stay_on_the_current_board: 留在当前董事会 [[ Stay on the Current Board
touch_access: 触摸访问%app_name% [[ touch access to %app_name%
touch_1: 对于%app_name%中的通讯板，触摸或单击按钮是最常见的访问方法。通过点击或单击按钮，通讯员可以在各板之间导航并选择单词或短语，以使系统为它们说话。 [[ Touching or clicking buttons is the most common access method for communication boards like those in %app_name%. By tapping or clicking on buttons, communicators can navigate between boards and select words or phrases to have the system speak for them.
touch_2: 一些沟通者需要更多的便利，例如根据手指的抬起位置，更大的文本或按钮之间的较大间距进行选择。这些都是可以从%app_name%内部的“首选项”视图中配置的。 [[ Some communicators need additional accommodations, like selecting based on where they lift their finger, bigger text, or larger gaps between buttons. These are all configurable from a user's "Preferences" view inside of %app_name%.
scanning_access: 扫描%app_name%中的访问权限 [[ scanning access in %app_name%
scanning_1: 一些通信器存在电机控制问题，这使他们很难按屏幕上的小按钮。如果它们可以击中较大的目标，例如蓝牙或称为“ Switch”的已连接按钮，或者甚至击中屏幕，那么%app_name%可以将电路板分成越来越小的块，一次“扫描”它们，然后等待供用户使用其开关进行选择。 [[ Some communicators have motor control issues which make it hard for them to hit small buttons on a screen. If they can hit larger targets like a bluetooth or connected button called a "Switch", or even just hit the screen, then %app_name% can break the board up into smaller and smaller chunks, "scan" through them one at a time, and wait for the user to select using their switch.
scanning_2: %app_name%可以按行，列或自定义区域进行扫描，甚至可以使用其他声音或音量进行扫描，以使通信者不至于感到困惑。它可以与外部开关配合使用，也可以使屏幕成为一个巨型按钮或两个独立按钮。所有这些设置在用户的“首选项”视图中可用。 [[ %app_name% can scan by row, column, or custom region, and can even use a different voice or volume for scanning to make things less confusing for the communicator. It works with external switches, or you can make the screen a giant button, or two independent buttons. All of these settings are available in a user's "Preferences" view.
dwell_access: %app_name%中的驻留访问 [[ dwell access in %app_name%
dwell_1: 对于没有一致的电机控制的通信器，眼动仪有时可能是一种有效的访问方法。眼动仪是跟踪眼球运动的特殊相机。当通信者的注视停留在按钮上一段时间后，系统可以代表通信者选择该按钮。或者，某些系统可以使用摄像头或传感器跟踪听觉或身体运动，以将鼠标光标像操纵杆一样对待，并且当光标“停留”在按钮上时，将其选中。眼动或驻留跟踪的速度可能比交换机访问速度快，但更难于正确校准。 [[ For communicators without consistent motor control, eye trackers can sometimes be an effective access method. An eye tracker is a special camera that tracks eye movements. When a communicator's gaze lingers on a button for a period of time, the system can select that button on behalf of the communicator. Alternatively, some systems can track hear or body movement using cameras or sensors to treat the mouse cursor like a joystick, and when the cursor "dwells" over a button, it is selected. Eye or dwell tracking can be faster than switch access, but is more difficult to calibrate correctly.
dwell_2: %app_name%可以与任何支持光标控制的眼动仪或系统配合使用（我们已经测试了Tobii，MyGaze，eyetech和LC Technologies以及EagleEyes硬件）。因为％app_name％自行处理这些事件，所以只需禁用它们即可。您可以在用户的“首选项”视图上微调跟踪设置。某些系统，例如EyeTribe和EyeX，也将需要在“首选项”中进行其他配置。 [[ %app_name% can work with any eye tracker or system that supports cursor control (we have tested Tobii, MyGaze, eyetech and LC Technologies, and EagleEyes hardware). Just disable "click" events since %app_name% handles these on its own. You can fine-tune the tracking settings on the user's "Preferences" view. Some systems, like EyeTribe and EyeX, will require additional configuration in "Preferences" as well.
modeling_1: 当某人在学习交流时（无论是通过口语还是使用AAC），重要的是他们要有很多支持交流者，以帮助他们看到好的榜样并正确学习。 [[ When someone is learning to communicate (whether by speaking or using AAC), it's important that they have lots of supporting communicators helping them see good examples and learn correctly.
modeling_2: 在AAC世界中，很多人称其为“建模”，重要的是AAC用户周围的人们向他们展示如何有效使用其设备的示例（“您想要Cookie吗？让我向您展示，您可以说*想要*和然后* cookie *“）。 [[ In the AAC world many people call this "modeling", and it's important that people around AAC users are showing them examples of how to effectively use their device ("You want a cookie? Let me show you, you could say *want* and then *cookie*").
modeling_3: 如果在%app_name%中点按了清除按钮三下，您会看到一个手指图标，指示“建模模式”。在建模模式下，％app_name％会跟踪作为建模操作按下的按钮，这样它们就不会出现在传播者的使用情况报告中。再次点击“清除”以退出建模模式。 [[ In %app_name% if you triple-tap the clear button, you'll see a finger icon indicating "Modeling Mode". When in Modeling Mode %app_name% tracks buttons pressed as modeling actions so they don't show up in a communicator's usage reports. Tap "Clear" again to leave Modeling Mode.
usage_reports: 使用情况报告 [[ Usage Reports
extra_reports_1: 主管还可以查看用户的通信历史记录。出于隐私原因，默认情况下禁用日志和报告，但是如果启用它们，则用户的主管可以查看其通信随时间的进展情况。 [[ Supervisors can also review a user's communication history. For privacy reasons logs and reports are disabled by default, but if you enable them then the user's supervisors can see how their communication is progressing over time.
extra_reports_2: 报告包括诸如沟通者最常使用的单词，一天中的什么时间使用设备以及屏幕上的哪个位置等信息。这些信息可以帮助团队保持协调一致并按时完成任务。 [[ Reports include information like what words the communicator is using most often, what time of day the device is being used, and even where on the screen they're hitting. This information can help the team stay coordinated and on task.
extra_home_boards_1: %app_name%有许多不同的主机板，您可以立即使用它们，也可以在复制时进行个性化设置。有些主板有一些大按钮，有些则有许多小按钮。 [[ %app_name% has a number of different home boards that you can start using right away, or copy and personalize as you go. Some boards have a few large buttons, and some have many small buttons.
extra_home_boards_2: 更多的按钮意味着更多的表达方式，但是一些用户在他们可以可靠按下的按钮上受到限制（请记住，现在您始终可以隐藏按钮，稍后再添加，因此看起来“太忙”的面板可能实际上是随着时间的推移它们可以成长为某种东西）。 [[ More buttons means more options for expression, but some users are limited in how small a button they can reliably hit (keep in mind you can always hide buttons for now that you want to add later, so a board that looks "too busy" may actually be something they can grow into over time).
intro_1: 感谢您注册%app_name%！我们很高兴您来这里，希望％app_name％对您有所帮助。如果您不熟悉％app_name％，本演练将帮助您入门。 [[ Thanks for signing up for %app_name%! We're excited you're here and hope %app_name% makes a difference for you. If you're new to %app_name%, this walkthrough will help you get started.
intro_3: 首先，请记住您的用户名（ _TR1B _ ），您可以在下载免费应用程序时使用它登录。您还可以使用网络浏览器在任何计算机上编辑板，练习和查看报告！ [[ First, remember your username (%{un}), you can use it to log in when you download the free app. You can also edit boards, practice and view reports from any computer with a web browser!
intro_2: 接下来，我们只想讲一些有关AAC（增补性和替代性交流）的知识，然后帮助确保您已正确设置%app_name%。点击底角的“下一步”开始。 [[ Next we'd like to teach just a little about AAC (Augmentative and Alternative Communication), and then help make sure you've got %app_name% set up correctly. Hit "Next" in the bottom corner to get started.

dashboard_1: 现在让我们继续学习如何开始使用%app_name%！ [[ Now let's move on to how to get started using %app_name%!
dashboard_2: 首次登录%app_name%时，将在仪表板上开始。在这里，您可以查看通知，访问个人资料和首选项以及浏览可用的主板。 [[ When you first log in to %app_name%, you'll start on the dashboard. Here you can see notifications, access your profile and preferences, and browse through the available home boards.
communicators_skip_dashboard: 主管帐户在首次登录时始终会看到仪表板，但是启用后，沟通者帐户会选择跳过仪表板并直接进入主面板。 [[ Supervisor accounts always see the dashboard when they first log in, but communicator accounts to opt to skip the dashboard and go straight to the home board when enabled.
logs_and_notes: 日志和注释 [[ Logs and Notes
logs_1: 除了查看使用历史记录之外，主管还可以访问每个通信会话的详细报告，并可以与用户团队进行记录并共享注释，因此每个人都知道当前的策略是什么以及什么方法行之有效。 [[ In addition to reviewing usage history, supervisors can access detailed reports on each communication session, and can make and share notes with the user's team, so everyone knows what the current strategy is and what is or isn't working well.
start_deciding: 除了选择板子以外，还有一些其他设置可以根据通信者的情况而更改。请记住，您以后随时可以在“首选项”下更改这些设置。 [[ In addition to selecting a board, there are some other settings that can change based on the communicator's situation. Keep in mind that you can always change these settings later under "Preferences".
text_placement: 您希望按钮如何出现？ [[ How do you want buttons to appear?
text_above_pictures: 上面有文字的图片 [[ Pictures with text above
no_pictures: 仅文字（无图片） [[ Text only (no pictures)
text_below_pictures: 图片下方有文字 [[ Pictures with text below
text_above_suggestion: 如果您不确定，上面的文字是从图片开始但随着时间的推移学会阅读单词的好选择。 [[ If you're not sure, having text above is a good option for starting with pictures but learning to read words over time.
symbol_background_question: 您要如何显示图片？ [[ How do you want pictures to display?
clear_background: 带有与按钮匹配的背景 [[ With a background matching the button
always_white_background: 始终带有白色背景 [[ Always with a white background
always_black_background: 始终带有黑色背景 [[ Always with a black background
high_contrast_black_background: 黑色背景高对比度 [[ High contrast with a black background
background_suggestion: 对于大多数用户而言，匹配按钮的颜色效果很好，但是对于某些具有白色背景的通信者，可以帮助进行对比和识别。 [[ For most users, matching the button color works well, but for some communicators having a white background can help with contrast and recognition.
which_symbols: 您更喜欢哪些符号？ [[ Which symbols do you prefer?
use_original_symbols: 使用木板的原始符号 [[ Use the board's original symbols
opensymbols: Opensymbols.org免费符号库 [[ Opensymbols.org free symbol libraries

noun_project: 名词项目黑色轮廓 [[ The Noun Project black outlines
arasaac: ARASAAC免费符号 [[ ARASAAC free symbols
premium_upgrade_required: 注意：您需要先在计费页面上购买高级符号升级，然后才能使用这些符号。 [[ NOTE: You will need to purchase the premium symbols upgrade on your billing page before you can use these symbols.
lessonpix_upgrade_required: 注意：您需要在配置文件页面上将LessonPix帐户连接到%app_name%帐户，然后才能使用这些符号。 [[ NOTE: You will need to connect your LessonPix account to your %app_name% account on your Profile page before you can use these symbols.
symbols_suggestion: 一些传播者已经知道符号库或可以从某种风格中受益，并且可以将%app_name%设置为使用他们熟悉的符号。也可以使用木板的原始符号。 [[ Some communicators already know a symbol library or can benefit from a certain style, and %app_name% can be set to use they're familiar with. Using the board's original symbols is also fine.
speak_mode_1: 选择了本机主板后，您可以通过启动“讲话模式”来访问它。 [[ Once you've selected a home board you can access it by launching into Speak Mode.
extra_speak_mode_2: 当您处于朗读模式时，您可以点击按钮进行朗读，然后将其添加到顶部的发声框中。如果您点击发声框，它将说出那里的所有按钮。退格键和清除按钮可以帮助保持句子窗口的清洁。 [[ When you're in Speak Mode you can hit buttons to have them spoken, and added to the vocalization box at the top. If you hit the vocalization box it'll speak all the buttons that are located there. The backspace and clear buttons can help keep the sentence window clean.

You can distribute these gift codes to users who can enter them when they sign up to get free access to %app_name%'s communication features.

discounts_intro2: 已被授予给用户的折扣价格。当人们使用%app_name%购买长期许可证时，他们可以输入提供的代码以获取购买金额折扣。 [[ has been granted a discounted rate to offer to its users. When people purchase a long-term license with %app_name% they can enter the provided code to receive a discount on their purchase amount.
user_gift_intro: 您输入的代码与一次性礼物代码相关联， [[ The code you entered is tied to a one-time gift code,
cloud_extras_gift_duration: 并且代码包括 _TR2B _ ，可免费使用%app_name%的云服务附加功能。 [[ and code includes %{dur} of free access to %app_name%'s cloud extras features.
single_extras_included: 礼品代码还包括访问高级符号的权限。 [[ The gift code also includes access to premium symbols.

gift_redeemed_by: 此礼物代码已由兑换 [[ This gift code has been redeemed by
gift_not_active: 此礼品代码不再有效或不可兑换。 [[ This gift code is no longer active or redeemable.
bulk_purchase_intro: 感谢您有意购买%app_name%！ ％app_name％是用于开发沟通者及其周围支持团队的强大工具。我们相信％app_name％可以为您与之合作的沟通者带来改变。请输入以下信息以完成购买。如有任何疑问，请随时与我们的支持团队联系。 [[ Thank you for your interest in purchasing %app_name%! %app_name% is a powerful tool for developing communicators, and the support team around them. We are confident that %app_name% can make a difference for the communicators you work with. Please enter the following information to complete your purchase. If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.
loading_purchase: 正在加载购买信息... [[ Loading purchase information...
invalid_or_disabled_gift: 此购买链接似乎已被禁用，或者是无效的链接。如果您认为有错误，请联系我们的支持团队。 [[ This purchase link appears to have been disabled or is an invalid link. If you believe there is an error, please contact our support team.
purchase_in_email: 您应该会收到一封包含此购买详情的电子邮件。如果几分钟后仍看不到电子邮件，请务必选中垃圾邮件框。 [[ You should receive an email with the details of this purchase. Make sure to check your spam box if you're not seeing the email come through within a few minutes.
invalid_gift: 此购买链接似乎已被禁用。如果您认为有错误，请联系我们的支持团队。 [[ This purchase link appears to have been disabled. If you believe there is an error, please contact our support team.
message_not_found: 未找到信息 [[ Message Not Found
message_not_available: 讯息不可用 [[ Message Not Available
message_no_longer_available: 您正在寻找的消息不再通过此链接提供。出于隐私和安全原因，消息链接仅激活7天。您仍然可以通过从仪表板登录%app_name%用户并与他们共享消息来向他们发送消息。 [[ The message you were looking for is no longer available through this link. For privacy and security reasons message links are only active for 7 days. You can still message %app_name% users by logging in and sharing a message with them from your dashboard.
sending_reply: 正在传送回覆... [[ Sending Reply...
error_sending_reply: 发送回复时出错 [[ Error Sending Reply
message_sent: 消息发送成功！ [[ Message successfully sent!
keep_private_link_secure: 这是一个专用链接，可用于将消息发送到%app_name%通信器。请不要与他人共享，以尊重通信者的隐私和安全。 [[ This is a private link that can be used to send messages to a %app_name% communicator. Please respect the communicator's privacy and security by not sharing it with others.
private_link_warning: 这是一个私人链接，将在7天后过期。如果传播者已授予您许可并且您想与他人共享，则可以导航到此消息的公共链接。 [[ This is a private link and will expire after 7 days. You can navigate to the public link for this message if the communicator has given you permission and you would like to share it with others.
speak_this_sentence: 说这句话 [[ Speak This Sentence
stash_explanation_1: 此人使用在平板电脑，电话或计算机上运行的软件来帮助他们进行交流。人们使用 [[ This person uses software running on a tablet, phone or computer to help them communicate. People use
aac: 增强与替代沟通 [[ Augmentative and Alternative Communication
stash_explanation_2: 由于许多不同的原因。实际上，它与使用键盘在线写消息没有什么不同，除了有些人甚至必须大声键入自己想说的内容。使用图片帮助识别单词和想法有时可以使找到合适的单词更容易。 [[ for many different reasons. It's really not that different from using a keyboard to write messages online, except some people have to type even what they want to say out loud. Using pictures to help identify words and ideas can sometimes make it easier to find the right words to say.
show_author: 分享时显示作者姓名 [[ Show author name when sharing
preview_symbol: 在某些网站上，将显示图像预览。在这些情况下，您可以选择想要显示的图像。 [[ In some web sites, an image preview will be shown. You can select the image you would like to appear in these cases.
image_license_attribution: 图片许可归因 [[ Image License Attribution
say_this_louder: 说这个大声 [[ Say this Louder
done_inserting_text: 完成插入文字 [[ Done Inserting Text
bad_recordings_import: 导入您的记录时出错。请确保您上传了有效的文件，然后重试。 [[ There was an error importing your recordings. Please make sure you uploaded a valid file and try again.
importing_recordings_please_wait: 导入录音，这可能需要几分钟... [[ Importing recordings, this could take a few minutes...
minute: 0分钟_._ 1分钟|| %{n}分钟 [[ 0 minutes || 1 minute || %{n} minutes
check_logging_with_user_first: 请确保沟通者理解您为什么要记录他们的沟通，并在继续之前获得他们的许可。 [[ Please make sure the communicator understands why you are logging their communication, and get their permission before proceeding.
logging_1: 启用日志记录后，所有代表您收集并存储在云中，这些信息包括按键，一天中的时间，硬件特性（如屏幕大小和方向）。其中一些报告使用Google图表来呈现匿名信息，例如每天按下的按钮以及按类型划分的词性频率。该数据用于生成报告，以帮助支持团队跟踪进度并设置有效目标，并且可以随时禁用。 [[ When you enable logging, information including buttons pressed, time of day, hardware characteristics like screen size and orientation are all collected and stored in the cloud on your behalf. Some of these reports use Google Charts to render anonymized information like buttons pressed per day and parts of speech frequency by type. This data is used to generate reports to help the support team track progress and set effective goals, and can be disabled at any time.
logging_2: 为了帮助支持AAC中的研究，%app_name%使用所有记录的使用情况信息的匿名摘要与社区共享总体趋势。这包括摘要数据，例如流行的核心词，总会话时间和典型的建模频率。 ％app_name％还通过提供启用匿名研究支持的％app_name％用户的匿名通信信息来与研究组织合作。用户个人资料和可识别的信息不会共享，但是匿名数据可能会公开发布，如果您不愿意与公共研究人员共享此用户的AAC通信，则可以选择在此处或在用户的首选项页面。请注意，选择退出的不活跃用户将不会在较长时间内从我们的系统中删除，以继续为研究人员提供支持。 [[ To help support research in AAC, %app_name% uses anonymized summaries of all logged usage information to share general trends with the community. This includes summary data like popular core words, total session time and typical frequency of modeling. %app_name% also collaborates with research organizations by providing anonymized communication information from %app_name% users who have enabled anonymous research support. User profiles and identifiable information are not shared, but the anonymized data may be published publicly, and if you're not comfortable sharing this user's AAC communication with public researchers, you can opt out here or on the user's preferences page. Note that inactive users who have opted in will not be deleted from our system for an extended period of time, to continue to provide support to researchers.
allow_research: 与研究人员和社区摘要报告共享匿名使用情况数据 [[ Share anonymized usage data with researchers and in community summary reports

logging_3: 此外，如果您愿意，%app_name%可以跟踪GPS数据，以更好地了解用户通信如何根据位置而变化。可以从用户的“首选项”页面从系统中手动清除所有日志记录数据。如果您想退出汇总数据收集或在故障排除时禁止％app_name％管理员查看您的日志，则可以在用户的“偏好设置”上选择“完全限制日志访问权限” [[ Additionally, if you'd like, %app_name% can track GPS data to provide better insights into how user communication changes based on location. enter_log_explainer: 一些通信器在数字通信系统和打印通信系统之间切换，这意味着您可能希望手动输入通信会话以使所有内容保持最新状态。为此，只需输入通讯员使用的单词或短语，每行按下一个“按钮”即可。 [[ Some communicators switch between digital and printed communication systems, which means that you may want to manually enter communication sessions to keep everything up-to-date. To do so, just enter the words or phrases the communicator used, with one "button" press per line.
paint_levels_explainer: %app_name%电路板可以内置开发级别，因此您可以从基础开始，并随着沟通者的发展逐步增加词汇量和资源。您可以使用绘画工具通过同时更新多个按钮来简化定义增长水平。 [[ %app_name% boards can have levels of development built-in, so you can start basic and gradually add vocabulary and resources as the communicator develops. You can use the paint tool to make defining growth levels easier by updating multiple buttons at the same time.
levels_are_suggestions: 注意：关卡描述是一项可选建议，您可能希望根据所使用的目标受众定义自己的关卡。通常，最好跳过中间级别，至少使用1级和10级作为进度点。 [[ NOTE: The level descriptions are an optional suggestion, you may want to define your own levels based on the target audience you are working with. In general it is better to skip middle levels and at least use Level 1 and Level 10 as progression points.

activity_match_for: 活动匹配 [[ activity a match for
modeling_ideas_intro_1: 您是否知道新的传播者是通过观察他人首先学会组合单词的？您是否知道婴儿在独自说话之前会听到数千小时的口语？还是AAC专家建议最多在设备上模拟与新用户的80％的通信？ [[ Did you know that new communicators learn to combine words by observing others do it first? Did you know that babies hear thousands of hours of spoken language before speaking on their own? Or that AAC experts recommend up to 80% of communication with a new user be modeled on a device?
modeling_ideas_intro_2: 建模或显示如何按下按钮进行交流的示例非常重要！当您开始与使用AAC的沟通者一起工作时，寻找机会为不同的单词或以不同方式对相同的单词建模。可能需要进行练习才能感到自在或看到结果，但是研究已经一遍又一遍地表明了不同模型的作用！ [[ Modeling, or showing examples of how to hit buttons to communicate, is very important! As you start work with communicators who are using AAC, look for chances to model different words, or the same words in different ways. It may take practice to get comfortable or to see results, but research has shown over and over how much of a different modeling makes!
modeling_intro_3: 建模思想是%app_name%工具，每天根据用户目标和日志历史记录中的目标词来推荐一些活动。我们希望它能为您提供许多想法，以帮助您的交流者成长！ [[ Modeling Ideas is a %app_name% tool that recommends a few activities every day based on target words from your user's goals and log history. We hope it helps give you lots of ideas to help your communicator grow!

valet_login_explainer: 代客登录允许您在受信任的设备之外共享临时用户名和密码，而无需暴露您的完整帐户。当某人使用您的代客登录名时，该设备将只能访问董事会和用户首选项，类似于仅建模帐户。代客密码将保持24小时可用，或者直到您使用常规的用户名和密码登录为止。之后，它将被禁用，直到您手动重新激活它为止。 [[ Valet login allows you to share a temporary username and password outside of a trusted device without exposing your full account. When someone uses your valet login, that device will have access to boards and user preferences only, similar to a modeling-only account. The valet password will remain available for 24 hours or until you log in using your normal username and password. After that it will be disabled until you manually re-activate it.

goals_explainer1: 目标是一种帮助沟通者及其支持团队保持其当前策略首要思想的方法。它们可以像“记住要使用核心词！”这样一般。或类似“输入新设置时使用问候语”之类的内容。请记住，这些可能是沟通者的目标（“回答是或否的问题”），或者是沟通者周围的支持团队的目标（“使用提示层次结构”）。 [[ Goals are a way to help the communicator and their support team keep their current strategies top of mind. They can be general like "Remember to use core words!" or specific like "Use greetings when entering a new setting". Remember, these can be goals for the communicator ("Answer questions with yes or no"), or for the support team around the communicator ("Use a prompting hierarchy").
goals_explainer2: 可以使用评估或在用户的日志上进行记录时，跟踪每个沟通者的目标。然后使用这些状态更新来显示有关目标如何随着时间推移进行的一般报告。 [[ Goals can be tracked for each communicator using assessments, or when making notes on a user's logs. These status updates are then used to show a general report of how the goal is progessing over time.
goals_explainer_3: 通过为沟通者创建目标，您可以随时开始使用目标。然后使用注释和评估来跟踪随着时间的推移实现目标的进度。用户可以有多个目标，但一次只能有一个“主要”目标。 [[ You can start using goals at any time by creating a goal for a communicator. Then use notes and assessments to track progress toward the goal over time. Users can have multiple goals, but only one "primary" goal at a time.
goals_explainer_4: 有关选择良好目标的更多信息，请请检出这些优质资源来自PrAACtical AAC。 [[ For more information on choosing good goals, please check out these great resources from PrAACtical AAC.

However, sometimes you may need a specific symbol library that communicators have been using longer.

badges_explainer: 该传播者获得了一个或多个徽章！某些徽章会自动在%app_name%中设置，但是您也可以轻松设置自己的目标并分配新徽章。 [[ This communicator had earned one or more badges! Some badges are automatically set up in %app_name%, but you can also easily set your own goals and assign new badges to go with them.
goals_explainer: 设定目标是沟通过程中的重要组成部分！在%app_name%中，目标可以帮助使团队保持在同一页面上并且在同一件事上开展工作，这对于新开发的沟通者很重要。 [[ Setting goals is an important part of the communication process! In %app_name%, goals can help keep the team on the same page and working on the same thing, which is important for newly-developing communicators.
goals_explainer_12: 如果您退出语音模式，然后转到帐户的“目标”部分，则可以找到现有目标或设置自己的目标。您甚至可以让系统自动跟踪实现目标的进度，并在沟通过程中向其授予徽章！ [[ If you exit Speak Mode and go to the 'Goals' section of your account you can find an existing goal or set one of your own. You can even have the system automatically track progress toward the goal, and award badges to the communicator as they progress!
goals_explainer_2: 要设置您的第一个目标，请点击下面的“新目标”按钮并开始使用。您可以找到一个现有目标或设定自己的目标。您甚至可以让系统自动跟踪实现目标的进度，并在沟通过程中向其授予徽章！ [[ To set your first goal, hit the 'New Goal' button below and get started. You can find an existing goal or set one of your own. You can even have the system automatically track progress toward the goal, and award badges to the communicator as they progress!

credentials_already_in_use: 看起来这些设置已被其他%app_name%用户使用 [[ It looks like those settings are already being used by a different %app_name% user
bad_webhook_url: 您输入的网址似乎与该集成所需的值不匹配 [[ The URL you entered doesn't seem to match the value needed for this integration
some_hard_to_hear: 有些人很难听到 [[ Some people are hard to hear
want_to_fix_that: -自己没有错。许多人需要技术的帮助才能听到自己的声音。不幸的是，很多技术难以使用，难以配置并且非常昂贵。 %app_name%是尝试修复该问题的新AAC应用。 [[ -- through no fault of their own. Many people need the assistance of technology in order for their voices to be heard. Unfortunately, a lot of that technology is hard to use, is hard to configure, and is crazy expensive. %app_name% is a new AAC app that tries to fix that.
why_cough_drop: 为什么是“ %app_name%”？咳嗽药水可以帮助您恢复已经拥有的声音，但是也许人们听不到那么好。它们很便宜，使用它们时没人会怪异的看着你。我们希望通过为日常使用的复杂通信需求提供价格合理，平易近人的简单解决方案来帮助AAC达到这一目标。 [[ Why "%app_name%"? Cough drops help you get back the voice you already had, but that maybe people couldn't hear so well. They're cheap and nobody looks at you weird when you use them. We want to help get AAC to that same point by providing affordable, approachable, simple solutions to complex communication needs that work for everyday use.
learn_as_you_go: 随手学习 [[ Learn as You Go
learn_as_you_go_content_1: 如果您不熟悉增强通信领域，那么它的几乎每个部分都会让人感到恐惧。您怎么可能知道正确的词和符号来满足个人的个人需求（以及想要，希望和希望）。不用担心，我们与许多不同的专家一起提供经过精心研究的模板，这些模板将帮助您入门。同样重要的是，我们为父母，照料者，兄弟姐妹提供了培训资源……参与支持个人的每个人都应该知道发生了什么事以及他们如何才能真正帮助成功地实现沟通策略。 [[ If you're new to the world of augmentative communication, just about every part of it feels intimidating. How could you possibly know the right words and symbols to pick for an individual's personal needs (and wants, and hopes, and wishes). Not to worry, we work with many different specialists to provide well-researched templates that will get you started. And just as importantly, we provide training resources for parents, caregivers, siblings... everyone involved in supporting an individual deserves to know what's going on and how exactly they can help the communication strategies be successful.
offline_content_1: 收集数据和跨设备工作非常好，但是仍然有很多地方没有良好的Wi-Fi连接。 %app_name%存储用户的板并在每个设备上登录，以便用户可以无中断地进行脱机通信。下次有互联网连接时，所有内容都会同步备份。 [[ Gathering data and working across devices is great, but there are still plenty of places where you won't have a good Wi-fi connection. %app_name% stores a user's boards and logs on each device so the user can communicate offline with no interrupts. Everything syncs back up the next time there is an internet connection.
personalization: 个性化和同步 [[ Personalization and Sync
personalization_content_1: 绑定到单个设备是有风险的，尤其是当您添加了许多自己的图片或四处移动图片符号以供个人使用时。您不仅可能会丢失数据和配置，而且如果屏幕破裂或电池没电了，您将很不幸，直到可以更换它为止。 %app_name%可在多个设备上工作，并为您保持内容同步，因此您不必担心。 [[ Being tied to a single device is risky, especially when you've added lots of your own pictures or moved picture symbols around for personal use. Not only can you possibly lose your data and configuration, but if a screen cracks or a battery dies, you're out of luck until it can be replaced. %app_name% works across multiple devices and keeps content in sync for you so you don't have to worry.
create_share: 创建，共享和重用 [[ Create, Share and Reuse
create_share_content_1: 创建一组通讯板时，没有人希望从头开始。 %app_name%使您可以轻松发现和个性化其他人创建的通信板。而且％app_name％鼓励内容和符号的开放许可，因此您不必怀疑是否在偶然的地方破坏了版权。 [[ Nobody wants to start from scratch when creating a set of communication boards. %app_name% lets you easily discover and personalize communication boards created by others. And %app_name% encourages open licenses of content and symbols, so you don't have to wonder if you're breaking copyright somewhere on accident.
open_board_support: %app_name%致力于使电路板开放和可重复使用。如此之多，以至于我们开始了 OpenBoards计划，以朝着标准文件格式迈进，以便跨所有应用程序和设备导入和导出木板，我们使用该格式作为我们的本机导入/导出格式。当我们有自由建立彼此的思想和成功的基础，而不管它们来自何处时，每个人都会获胜。 [[ %app_name% is committed to making boards open and reusable. So much so that we started the OpenBoards initiative to work toward a standard file format for importing and exporting boards across all apps and devices, and we use that format as our native import/export format. When we have the freedom to build off of each other's ideas and successes regardless of where they came from, everyone wins.
coordination_content_1: 必须将个人的通信设备从他们身边拿下来才能对其进行编程是一件可怕的事情，它剥夺了他们的声音。 %app_name%使治疗师，专家，父母和其他团队成员可以修改通讯集，甚至可以在每个人都可以从中受益的地方记录会话笔记和消息。 [[ Having to take an individual's communication device away from them in order to program it is a terrible thing, it takes away their voice. %app_name% lets therapists, specialists, parents and other team members modify the communication set and even log session notes and messages in a place where everyone can benefit from them.
insights_content_1: 有时很难知道什么在起作用，什么在不起作用。增强交流是一个不断进行的修改和引入词汇的过程，如果没有好的报告，就很难确定需要更改的内容。 %app_name%可以记录所有通信并根据时间，位置和词汇提供有洞察力的报告，从而使每个人都可以清楚地知道将精力集中在什么地方以获得最佳结果。 [[ Sometimes it's really hard to know what's working and what's not. Augmentative communication is an ongoing process of modifying and introducing vocabulary, and without good reports it's difficult to be sure what needs to change. %app_name% can log all communications and provide insightful reports based on time, location and vocabulary that makes it clearer for everyone just where to focus their efforts for the best results.
security_content_1: %app_name%提供所有板，日志和用户信息的安全通信和存储。未经明确许可，我们不会共享用户数据，私人委员会和使用日志等私人信息。我们非常重视用户隐私，因为最终，我们正在谈论的是潜在地记录个人所说的一切。这类信息值得保护。 [[ %app_name% provides secure communication and storage of all boards, logs and user information. We do not share private information like user data, private boards and usage logs without explicit permission. We take user privacy extremely seriously because, at the end of the day, what we're talking about is potentially recording everything an individual ever says. That kind of information deserves to be protected.
open_source_content_1: 大多数AAC系统都是基于专有技术构建的，这意味着您并不真正知道它们的安全性，因此更容易被锁定并被迫进入其工作方式。 %app_name%是开放源代码，并且以开放的思维方式构建，因此您可以亲自了解系统中的内容，而且您始终可以轻松访问和导出所有数据。 [[ Most AAC systems are built on proprietary technology, which means you don't really know how secure they are, it's easier to get locked in and forced into their way of doing things. %app_name% is open source and built with an open mindset, so you can see for yourself what goes into the system, and you always have easy access and exports for all your data.

In the mean time here's some easy next steps. You can get back to this list anytime from the dashboard, just hit the logo in the top corner then open this list again.

button_count_prompt:
伟大的！这是您的主板现在的样子。如果需要，可以对其进行微调以显示更少或更多的按钮以开始。您可以只需要几个按钮就可以从基本级别开始，也可以立即显示所有内容。

您可以通过调整通讯器的级别轻松更改以后显示的按钮数量。 [[ Great! Here's what your home board will look like right now. If you want, you can fine-tune it to show fewer or more button to start off. You can start at a basic level with only a few buttons, or show everything right away.

You can easily change the number of buttons shown later by adjusting the level for the communicator.
grid_prompt:
灿烂！接下来，让我们找出按钮的最佳尺寸！如果按钮太大，则将没有空间随着时间的推移而增长-尝试找到通信器可以可靠使用的最小尺寸。

请记住，如果按钮很大，则始终可以隐藏按钮最初，电路板不堪重负，但后来很难更改网格大小。 [[ Splendid! Next let's figure out what size of buttons will work best! If the buttons are too big then there won't be room to grow over time -- try to find the smallest size that your communicator can reliably use.

Remember that you can always hide buttons if a large board is overwhelming at first, but it's harder to change the grid size later.

bulk_purchase_explainer: 我们喜欢与希望支持多种沟通者的学区和组织合作！如果您有兴趣购买多个许可证，使用PCard或不使用信用卡购买，请联系我们的销售团队以获取更多信息。请注意，许多PCard也可以与我们的在线信用卡处理系统一起使用。 [[ We love working with school districts and organizations who want to support multiple communicators! If you're interested in purchasing multiple licenses, using a PCard, or purchasing without using a credit card, please contact our sales team for more information. Note that many PCards will work with our online credit card processing system as well.

expiration_notes_pre: 即使资金意外地成为问题，我们也不想掩盖任何人的声音。当用户的订阅到期时，%app_name%仍将用作通信系统，但是将禁用高级功能，例如报告和视频注释。 [[ We don't want to shut off anyone's voice, even if funding unexpectedly becomes an issue down the line. When a user's subscription expires %app_name% will still work as a communication system but premium features like reporting and video notes will be disabled.

robust_1: 刚开始时，健壮的词汇似乎有些令人生畏，但它们可以是功能强大的语言集，传播者可以随着时间的流逝而逐渐成长。尝试更多地关注通信器可以成功访问的按钮数量，而不是屏幕有多忙，因为您始终可以隐藏按钮并计划以后再启用它们。这些板卡可以强调运动计划或务实交流，但都具有核心词和专业词的良好集合，并且还提供个性化词汇的空间。 [[ Robust vocabularies may seem a little intimidating at first, but they can be powerful language sets that the communicator can grow into over time. Try to focus more on how many buttons the communicator can successfully access rather than how busy the screen is, because you can always hide buttons and plan to re-enable them later. These board sets can have an emphasis on motor planning or pragmatic communication, but all have a good collection of core and specialized words, and room for personalized vocabulary as well.
cause_effect_1: 对于AAC来说是全新的沟通者，有时从不使用沟通板开始是有好处的，只是为了帮助他们了解他们可以按一下按钮，事情就会发生。这些因果关系板可以帮助培训传播者如何以一种有趣的方式使用其访问方法。 [[ For communicators that are brand-new to AAC, sometimes it's beneficial to start with a non-communication board, just to help them learn that they can hit buttons and things will happen. These cause-and-effect boards can help train communicators how to use their access method in a fun way.
simple_starts_1: 对于一些使用少量简单按钮开始的沟通者，可以帮助他们使用AAC感到舒适。从简单的电路板设置过渡到更坚固或更长期的操作可能会比较棘手，但是每个沟通者都是不同的。 [[ For some communicators starting with a small set of simple buttons can help them get comfortable using AAC. It can be trickier to move from a simple board set to something more robust or long-term, but each communicator is different.
functional_1: 有时，强调更多功能性的交流对于交流者可能很有价值。开始使用AAC时，根据通信者的发展水平，功能板可能会更直观。 [[ Sometimes an emphasis on more functional communication can be of value for communicators. Depending on a communicator's developmental level when starting to use AAC, functional boards can be more intuitive.
phrases_1: 对于会说话的沟通者来说，录制自己的声音进行回放可能在压力很大的情况下或在ALS等退化条件下很有用。基于短语的板对于这些沟通者可能是有用的模板，并且可以与%app_name%的内置记录工具很好地配合，从而轻松为沟通者创建消息库。 [[ For communicators that can speak, recording their own voice for playback can be helpful in stressful situations, or for degenerative conditions like ALS. Phrase-based boards can be a useful template for these communicators, and work well with %app_name%'s built-in recording tools to easily create message banks for the communicator.
keyboards_1: %app_name%支持包含单词预测功能的自定义键盘，因此可以熟练拼写的通信者可能会受益于基于键盘的板集。一些键盘带有快速短语或常用词，以帮助加快通信速度。 [[ %app_name% supports custom keyboards that include word prediction, so communicators that can spell proficiently may benefit from keyboard-based board sets. Some keyboards come with quick phrases or common words to help speed up communication.

purchase_subscription_1e: Extra Ideas是%app_name%功能，仅适用于拥有付费高级帐户的用户。请 [[ Extra Ideas is a %app_name% feature that's only available to users who have a paid premium account. Please
core_explainer: 核心词是经常使用的词，通常具有多种含义或意图。它们在许多不同的设置中很有用，并且对于许多传播者来说都是有价值的高频词。浏览列表中可能对当前板有意义的任何核心词。 [[ Core words are frequently-used words that often have multiple meanings or intents. They are useful in lots of different settings, and are valuable high-frequency words for many communicators. Browse the list for any core words that might make sense for the current board.
fringe_explainer: 边缘词是特殊的或特定的词，例如人或食物类型。交流者应该可以使用代表他们的兴趣，联系和所学事物的附带词。浏览类别以查找单词或获取可以添加到当前面板的单词的提示。 [[ Fringe words are specialized or specific words, like people or types of food. Communicators should have access to fringe words that represent their interests, connections, and things they are learning about. Browse the categories to find words or get ideas for words that could be added to the current board.
recordings_explainer: 对于某些沟通者来说，记录他们将来希望更容易使用的单词或短语可能很有用。您可以从录音列表中选择短语，以将其快速添加到当前板中。 [[ It can be useful for some communicators to record words or phrases that they will want to use more easily in the future. You can select phrases from the list of recordings to have them quickly added to the current board.
requests_explainer: 沟通者和主管可以要求将单词添加到他们的词汇集中。该列表包括已要求沟通者使用的所有单词。您可以选择任何一个将它们添加到当前板上。 [[ Communicators and supervisors can request to have words added to their vocabulary set. This list includes all the words that have been requested for a communicator. You can select any to have them added to the current board.

After the 2-month trial if you need a little more time, or don't have the resources to make a large up-front purchase, you can pay monthly for a %app_name% subscription, or for a hefty discount you can purchase a full %app_name% license.

stash_explanation: 按钮存储可以更轻松地在多个板上重复使用或移动按钮。一旦存在，您复制到存储中的按钮将显示在此处。要将按钮复制到存储中，请将其拖动到存储按钮，或在该按钮的“常规设置”区域中单击复制按钮。 [[ The button stash makes it easier to reuse or move buttons across multiple boards. Buttons that you copy to your stash will appear here once there are any. To copy a button to the stash either drag it to the stash button or click the copy button in the General settings area for the button.

word_usage_examples: 当您找到使用同一单词的多种方法时，语言学习会更好。以下是一些使用“ %{word}”的示例，可能会有所帮助。 [[ Language learning works better when you can find multiple ways to use the same word. Here are some examples using "%{word}" that might be helpful.
